name: Purgatory (itch) (Mykaelos)
description:
What's left of your Soul has been Shattered into Shards.
Scour your own personal PURGATORY for your Soul Shards and flee before it catches you...

Created for #asylumjam2015 and #procjam2015. The darkness maze is randomly generated.
Jam page

Controls:
Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
Mouse - to turn around
Shift - Sprint! You'll definitely need this...

This was my first #Horror game. Let me know what you think! I'm always looking for any feedback or insights you might want to share. Thanks!
